alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Fillmore; Hall; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nuckolls; Webster; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 4:42PM CDT until May 12 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clay County in south central Nebraska... Northwestern Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Webster County in south central Nebraska... Eastern Adams County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern York County in east central Nebraska... Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Northwestern Fillmore County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Merrick County in central Nebraska... Southeastern Howard County in central Nebraska... Eastern Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 441 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hastings to near Glenvil to near Lawrence, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated and hail observed in Hastings. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Trumbull and Hansen around 445 PM CDT. Doniphan, Edgar, Fairfield and Inland around 450 PM CDT. Clay Center and Giltner around 455 PM CDT. Harvard and Phillips around 500 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Aurora, Saronville, Sutton, Stockham, Marquette, Grafton, Henderson, Hampton and Lushton. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 307 and 359. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Clay; Fillmore; Hall; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nuckolls; Webster; York
